column1: * 1979 - The Jackanory episode "Flies and Spiders" is aired on the BBC.
* 1998 - Tolkien: Man and Myth is published.
* 2002 - The Greek Tolkien Societies Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin is founded.

column2: a feast of the Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin.

column1: * 2010 - The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films is published in the US.
